item.title: Resources
item.description: .article-style img { display: inline-block; } stopifnot(require(badger)) stopifnot(require(BiocStyle)) R packages I maintain or co-develop the following R packages. r badger::badge_custom(x = "Bioconductor", y = "BiocCheck", color = "blue", url = "http://bioconductor.org/packages/BiocCheck/") r BiocStyle::Biocpkg("BiocCheck") executes Bioconductor-specific package checks. r badger::badge_custom(x = "GitHub", y = "deeperTools", color = "c9510c", url = "https://github.com/kevinrue/deeperTools") r BiocStyle::Githubpkg("kevinrue/deeperTools") provides convenience functions to process files produced by deepTools. r badger::badge_custom(x = "Bioconductor", y = "GOexpress", color = "blue", url = "http://bioconductor.
